ygData.subject: Re: Diamond dust
ygData.msgSnippet: True, but the Ogres only ask for Dufrenite, which is the gem needed for the Shaman quest.  Whoever is curious enough to try this ought to try with a cheap gem
ygData.messageBody:
True, but the Ogres only ask for Dufrenite, which is the gem needed for the
Shaman quest. Whoever is curious enough to try this ought to try with a cheap
gem before trying diamonds. I suspect it is ONLY for the Shaman quest.

Sean Dorsey wrote:

> From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>
>
> Someone said that if you give the Ogre's in Lake Rathe a Gem they will give
> back "Crushed <gem>", or "Powdered <Gem>". I have not tested this, but I
> was told that one of the Shaman armor quests needed a crushed gem.
>
> Dass Swiftruner,
> Cazic-Thule
>
>
